# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

This project follows [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/)
and [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

<!-- --8<-- [start:content] -->

## [Unreleased]

### Added

* Initial package structure with `src` layout and PEP 561 type marker
* Example `hello` module with `greet()` and `add()` functions
* Full test suite — pytest, coverage (80 % threshold), doctests, parallel execution
* MkDocs Material documentation with auto-generated API reference
* Pre-commit hooks — Ruff, mypy, Bandit, Commitizen
* GitHub Actions CI/CD — lint, test matrix, docs build, PyPI publish
* Read the Docs configuration
* Codecov integration
* Dependabot for automated dependency updates
* Issue templates, pull request template, and security policy

<!-- --8<-- [end:content] -->
